description.value:
• Look: Your fur falls into white shades.
  • Cold Resistance: You are resistant to cold damage.
  • Spirit Casting: You can cast the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.KH6D03TEJYZNA62N]{Deposition} cantrip at will. At 5th level, you can cast the Frigid Barrage spell once per long rest.
    You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
    If you are a spellcaster, you can also add these spells to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
  • Element Flail: Of all parts of a Zhier, the tail is the point most connected to its spirit element. You can swing your tail like a natural weapon flail. This weapon has both the Light and Finesse properties, and deals 1d4 cold damage as it cold-snaps the point of collision.
